basicInfo.name: Sarah
basicInfo.flavor: The Alluring Succubus Sarah has lived through the ages, eventually claiming the queen's throne. Her beauty grows with time, stirring jealousy among other succubi.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 100% of Magic Attack 1 time(s).
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 120% of Magic Attack.

Skill 1.name: Demon's Charm
Skill 1.desc:
3 Enemies
 - Deals damage equal to 95% of Magic Attack 1 time(s).
 - 100% chance to inflict Defense Reduction. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Effect: Defense Reduction to 24%.
超越2段階達成効果
 - Adds Effect: 100% chance to inflict 13% Damage Reduction. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]

Skill 2.name: Demon's Kiss
Skill 2.desc:
3 Allies
 - Grants 2 Debuff Removal(s).
 - Grants Defense Boost. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
スキル強化効果
 - Adds Effect: 34% Defense Boost. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
超越6段階達成効果
 - Changes Number of Targets: To All Allies

Passive.name: Demonic Pact
Passive.desc:
Self
 - Grants Damage Resistance. [Always Active]
 - All Allies
 - Grants Sleep Immunity. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
 - Grants Sleep Immunity upon using a basic attack 1 time(s). [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
 - Removes 2 debuff(s) when HP falls to 30% or lower. [1 Time(s) per Battle]
 - Heals HP equal to 10% of the caster's Max HP when HP falls to 30% or lower. [1 Time(s) per Battle]
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Effect: Damage Resistance to 16%.

transcendence.transcend_7: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_8: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_9: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_10: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_11: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_12: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.

profile.likes: Kris, entranced humans, red wine, fresh beef tartare
profile.dislikes: Evan's group, Rudy, dirty or smelly things, valkyries, smart humans
profile.story: The Alluring Succubus Sarah has lived through the ages, eventually claiming the queen's throne. Her beauty grows with time, stirring jealousy among other succubi.

basicInfo.name: Sarah
basicInfo.flavor: Sarah has been given a name bestowed upon succubi who have drained countless life forces and can effortlessly charm and captivate others' hearts.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 90% of Magic Attack 1 time(s).
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 90% of Physical Attack.

3 Enemies
 - Deals damage equal to 85% of Magic Attack 1 time(s).
 - 100% chance to inflict Defense Reduction. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 85% of Physical Attack.

Skill 2.name: Demon's Kiss
Skill 2.desc:
3 Allies
スキル強化効果
 - Grants 2 Debuff Removal(s).

Passive.name: Demonic Pact
Passive.desc:
Self
 - Grants Damage Resistance. [Always Active]
 - All Allies
 - Grants Sleep Immunity. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
 - Grants Sleep Immunity upon using a basic attack 1 time(s). [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
 - Removes 2 debuff(s) when HP falls to 30% or lower. [1 Time(s) per Battle]
 - Heals HP equal to 9% of the caster's Max HP when HP falls to 30% or lower. [1 Time(s) per Battle]

basicInfo.name: Sarah
basicInfo.flavor: Sarah is a succubus living in Purgatory. Succubi are high-ranking demonkin who lure adventurers in to drain them of their power and magic.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 80% of Magic Attack 1 time(s).
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 80% of Physical Attack.

Skill 1.name: Demon's Charm
Skill 1.desc:
3 Enemies
 - Deals damage equal to 75% of Magic Attack 1 time(s).
 - 100% chance to inflict Defense Reduction. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 75% of Physical Attack.

Skill 2.name: Demon's Kiss
Skill 2.desc:
3 Allies
スキル強化効果
 - Grants 2 Debuff Removal(s).

Passive.name: Demonic Pact
Passive.desc:
Self
 - Grants Damage Resistance. [Always Active]
 - All Allies
 - Grants Sleep Immunity. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
 - Grants Sleep Immunity upon using a basic attack 1 time(s). [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
 - Removes 1 debuff(s) when HP falls to 30% or lower. [1 Time(s) per Battle]
 - Heals HP equal to 8% of the caster's Max HP when HP falls to 30% or lower. [1 Time(s) per Battle]
